steps.title: Hello, world!
steps.description: Write a program that prints 'Hello, world!' to the console.
steps.explanation: Use the built-in print() function to display text.

steps.title: Variables
steps.description: Create a variable called 'name' and assign it a value. Then print it.
steps.explanation: Variables store data. Assign a value using = and print it.

steps.title: Numbers and Math
steps.description: Add two numbers and print the result.
steps.explanation: You can use arithmetic operations like +, -, *, / to perform math.
